profile.name: Manasvi Sareen
profile.description: A seasoned software architect with 17+ years of experience in full-stack development and system architecture, currently focused on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and AI integration. Expertise spans modern JavaScript ecosystems, LLM frameworks, embeddings, prompt engineering, and performance tuning of distributed UI systems. Proven leadership in both enterprise systems and experimental AI projects, delivering scalable, performant, and secure applications.

aboutMe.detailDescription: A seasoned software architect with 17+ years of experience in full-stack development and system architecture, currently focused on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems and AI integration.
summaryPoints: Architected and led frontend design for enterprise platforms, focusing on modularization and performance.
Proficiency in mapping business requirements, technical documentation, design, development of a business solution
Developed micro frontend architecture for the DXP Web application, reducing cost of development and deployment.
Proficiency in full stack Web and with nodejs development
Architected a Support Bot platform using RAG systems for real-time documentation, Video Tutorials and knowledge base.
Built experimental pipeline for embedding generation and chunking strategies.
Proficient with local RAG setup and embedding orchestration.

experience.heading: Senior Architect
experience.description: Workplace Architect, took initiative focusing on LLM Integrations, including RAG and smooth retrieval of documentation workflow. Developed performance SDKs to evaluate and improve UI latency and page metrics. Mentored multiple teams on embedding generation, prompt flow design, and modularization.

experience.heading: UI Architect
experience.description: Architected and led frontend design for enterprise platforms. Initiated modularization and micro frontend rollouts. Introduced security, testing automation, and performance standards.

experience.heading: Software Designer
experience.description: Designed multi-system reporting platforms across currency desks. Implemented unified Angular-based UI for legacy report platforms. Delivered on key regulatory and trading desk initiatives.

experience.heading: Software Engineer
experience.description: Designed monitoring tools, web deployment automation, and WCF services. Deployed on AWS, led SVN-based build and release processes.
